mapper.sql: ID, STORE_CODE, STORE_NAME, MERCHANT_ID, BRANCH_NAME, ORGCODE, STORE_PROV, STORE_CITY, STORE_TOWN, STORE_STR, STORE_RIDGE, STORE_HOME, ZIPCODE, MAJOR_CONTACT_NAME, MAJOR_CONTACT_PHONE, MAJOR_CONTACT_MAIL, MAJOR_CONTACT_POSITION, MAJOR_CONTACT_QQ, MAJOR_CONTACT_WEIXIN, FINANCE_NAME, FINANCE_PHONE, FINANCE_MAIL, BUSINESS_START_TIME, BUSINESS_END_TIME, MAIN_BRAND, MANAGER_ID, STORE_MANAGER_BINDING_TIME, CLOSEDBY, CLOSEDON, ACTIVEDBY, ACTIVEDON, CREATEDBY, CREATEDON, MODIFIEDBY, MODIFIEDON, ACTIVE_STATUS, STORE_STATUS, OPER_MODE_CODE, MERCHANT_TYPE_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_NAME, ACCOUNT_SUB_BANK, ACCOUNT_CITY, BANK_ACCOUNT, FU_MOBILE, FU_PASSWORD, FEE_PROPORTION, CALCULATE_METHOD, VERSION, PASS_RATE_TIME, PASS_RATE, JSPN_VALUE, STORE_REGISTER_NO, STORE_DESC, FACE_CHECK,STORE_CHARACTER

b.ID, b.STORE_CODE, b.STORE_NAME, b.MERCHANT_ID, b.BRANCH_NAME, b.ORGCODE, b.STORE_PROV, b.STORE_CITY, b.STORE_TOWN, b.STORE_STR, b.STORE_RIDGE, b.STORE_HOME, b.ZIPCODE, b.MAJOR_CONTACT_NAME, b.MAJOR_CONTACT_PHONE, b.MAJOR_CONTACT_MAIL, b.MAJOR_CONTACT_POSITION, b.MAJOR_CONTACT_QQ, b.MAJOR_CONTACT_WEIXIN, b.FINANCE_NAME, b.FINANCE_PHONE, b.FINANCE_MAIL, b.BUSINESS_START_TIME, b.BUSINESS_END_TIME, b.MAIN_BRAND, b.MANAGER_ID, b.STORE_MANAGER_BINDING_TIME, b.CLOSEDBY, b.CLOSEDON, b.ACTIVEDBY, b.ACTIVEDON, b.CREATEDBY, b.CREATEDON, b.MODIFIEDBY, b.MODIFIEDON, b.ACTIVE_STATUS, b.STORE_STATUS, b.OPER_MODE_CODE, b.MERCHANT_TYPE_CODE, b.ACCOUNT_NAME, b.BANK_NAME, b.ACCOUNT_SUB_BANK, b.ACCOUNT_CITY, b.BANK_ACCOUNT, b.FU_MOBILE, b.FU_PASSWORD, b.FEE_PROPORTION, b.CALCULATE_METHOD, b.VERSION, b.PASS_RATE_TIME, b.PASS_RATE, b.JSPN_VALUE, b.STORE_REGISTER_NO, b.STORE_DESC, b.FACE_CHECK, b.STORE_CHARACTER, p.provinceName storeProvName, c.cityName storeCityName, d.districtName storeTownName
mapper.select: select DISTINCT bs.ID,bs.STORE_NAME,bs.MANAGER_ID,bs.MERCHANT_ID,bs.STORE_CHARACTER from bs_store_sa bsa left join bs_store bs on bsa.STORE_ID = bs.ID where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and STORE_STATUS = "storeopen" and ACTIVE_STATUS = "storeon" and bsa.IS_DEL=0

select
FROM bs_store b LEFT JOIN sm_province p ON p.provinceId = b.STORE_PROV LEFT JOIN sm_city c on c.cityId = b.STORE_CITY LEFT JOIN sm_district d on d.districtId = b.STORE_TOWN where b.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:

STORE_CODE,

mapper.update:
update bs_store
STORE_CODE = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_NAME = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGCODE = #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_PROV = #{storeProv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_CITY = #{storeCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_TOWN = #{storeTown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_STR = #{storeStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_RIDGE = #{storeRidge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_HOME = #{storeHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIPCODE = #{zipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR_CONTACT_NAME = #{majorContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR_CONTACT_PHONE = #{majorContactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR_CONTACT_MAIL = #{majorContactMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR_CONTACT_POSITION = #{majorContactPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR_CONTACT_QQ = #{majorContactQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR_CONTACT_WEIXIN = #{majorContactWeixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_NAME = #{financeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_PHONE = #{financePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_MAIL = #{financeMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_START_TIME = #{businessStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_END_TIME = #{businessEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_BRAND = #{mainBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STORE_MANAGER_BINDING_TIME = #{storeManagerBindingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSEDBY = #{closedby,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CLOSEDON = #{closedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTIVEDBY = #{activedby,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ACTIVEDON = #{activedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEDBY = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDON = #{createdon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIEDBY = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDON = #{modifiedon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTIVE_STATUS = #{activeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_STATUS = #{storeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_MODE_CODE = #{operModeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_TYPE_CODE = #{merchantTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_SUB_BANK = #{accountSubBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_CITY = #{accountCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FU_MOBILE = #{fuMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FU_PASSWORD = #{fuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_PROPORTION = #{feeProportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CALCULATE_METHOD = #{calculateMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PASS_RATE_TIME = #{passRateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PASS_RATE = #{passRate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
JSPN_VALUE = #{jspnValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_REGISTER_NO = #{storeRegisterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_DESC = #{storeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACE_CHECK = #{faceCheck,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_CHARACTER = #{storeCharacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
